RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 1 1 1/16M Turf CR: 78. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RED BURGUNDY went to the front, showed the way with a clear advantage while inside to the two path, responded well when asked at the quarter-pole then came under a drive in upper stretch, remained clear into the final furlong, shortened stride into the final sixteenth and just held under strong urging. DIVIDEND RECAP was off slow and last to commence then asked to move up, settled on the inside, was roused on the final turn, moved off the rail under a drive in upper stretch, shifted out more while picking up stride in the final furlong, closed well in the final sixteenth and just missed while able to get the place. NAUGHTY DESTINY went around the first turn in the two path, settled off the pace, was asked in the three path on the far turn, moved out while chasing in the stretch, gained into the final sixteenth and finished willingly for the show. FAST AND FRISKY was taken under a tight hold early, saved ground while well placed just off the pace, came out four wide into upper stretch, drifted out some in pursuit of the winner nearing the furlong marker and lacked the needed kick. CALLING AN AUDIBLE bumped with a rival on the initial straightaway then was very rank under tight restraint, rounded the first turn in the three path, was reserved near the back, raced greenly behind horses leaving the backstretch, went four wide on the final turn and improved position. COACH SESSA broke in then was corrected by the rider, settled on the inside, steadied briefly against the rail at the five-sixteenths then was roused while moving to the two path and lacked the needed response. PRETTY UP was off slow then had her path taken, raced under reserve near the rear while saving ground, came out into the stretch then moved further out in the drive and failed to threaten. STARSINTHECITY moved in while taken in hand, was reserved in the two path, dropped back on the far turn and lacked the needed response. SHE IS ALL BUSINES went four wide on the first turn, settled on the outside without the benefit of cover, was asked four wide on the far turn, came five wide into the stretch and was no factor. SNARKY was taken under a tight hold while forwardly placed early, rounded the first turn in the two path, tracked the pace on the outside, was given her cue in the two path on the far turn, spun five wide into upper stretch and came up empty. PRACTICAL ROYALTY went three wide on the first turn, settled on the outside, was roused three wide on the far turn, came six wide into upper stretch and failed to respond. SARATOGA SMOKESHOW bumped with a foe on the opening straightaway, went three wide on the turns and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Red Burgundy
ENTRY.COMMENT: to front,clear pace,dictated terms,near ins turns,responded,held

ENTRY.NAME: Fast and Frisky
ENTRY.OWNER: NY Final Furlong Racing Stable SunsetRidge Racing Stable and Sportsmen Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: tight hold early,well placed ins,came out 4w1/4,lackd needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: Pretty Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow,path taken,inside turns,came out 1/4,mvd out,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Coach Sessa
ENTRY.OWNER: Madaket Stables LLC and Doheny Michael

ENTRY.NAME: Calling an Audible
ENTRY.OWNER: Rudina Stable Phoenix Rising Racing Stables Stathis John Paddock Proud LLC North

ENTRY.NAME: Saratoga Smokeshow
ENTRY.OWNER: Toga Party Racing Stable Feld Sean and Smith Holli D

ENTRY.NAME: Starsinthecity
ENTRY.OWNER: Broman Sr Chester and Broman Mary
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd in,in hand,reserved 2path,drop back 2nd turn,no threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 74. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Pre ferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BETTER HUMOR ME chased the pace on the outside then in the two path on the turn, gained to make a bid in upper stretch, led under a drive into the final furlong, shook clear into the final sixteenth and held under strong urging. FOXY CARA bumped with a rival at the start then bobbled, was urged along off the pace, was taken in hand briefly near the half-mile pole, went around the turn in the two path, spun three wide into the stretch then moved out around the three-sixteenths, gained in the final furlong and got up for the place. CUPRITE went to the front, set the pace with a clear advantage, vied inside on the turn, was asked near the quarter-pole, lost the lead in upper stretch and was outfinished. BUSSIA leaned out at the start then bobbled, chased the pace on the outside then in the three path on the turn, gained to make an outside bid in upper stretch, dropped back into the final furlong and weakened. MONETARY MONARCH was reluctant to load, lost her footing just after the start while awkwardly into stride, was urged along off the pace, moved from the two path to the four path on the turn, came five wide into the stretch and improved position. TERESA was urged along off the pace, dropped back near the half-mile pole, went four then five wide on the turn, came six wide into the stretch and failed to threaten. SWEET LIBERTY broke out at the start, settled off the pace, was urged three then four wide on the turn, came five wide into the stretch and was no factor. MALU bumped with a rival at the start, was urged along just off the pace, chased inside on the turn and came up empty. ISLAND ROSE was forced out while last away, went three then four wide on the turn and showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Cuprite
ENTRY.OWNER: Donk David G Behrendt John T Marquis Charles K Punk Jr William J DiLeo Philip an

ENTRY.NAME: Monetary Monarch
ENTRY.OWNER: The Estate of Richard J Lugovich
ENTRY.COMMENT: lost footing after brk,urged along,2-4w turn,5w1/4,improved

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Liberty
ENTRY.OWNER: Thummps Racing Stable LLC Jacoutot Peter and Paradise Farms Corp
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,settled,3-4wide turn,5w into lane,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Island Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced out brk,last away,urged,3-4w turn,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Bussia
ENTRY.OWNER: Bond Racing Stable and Counter Point Thoroughbreds LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 105. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 102000. (UP TO $17,748 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Ol der, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void ).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOLD JOURNEY came outward at the break, settled off the pace, gained in the two path on the turn, angled out in upper stretch, rallied under a left-handed crop while remaining on his inside lead, swapped to the proper lead at the furlong marker then made a bid, dueled outside of the runner-up under a strong hand-ride to the finish and narrowly prevailed. HE'SMYHONEYBADGER pressed the pace on the outside then in the three path on the turn, took the lead while drifting out in upper stretch, continued to drift out some while dueling inside of the winner in the final furlong and was denied. BUSINESS MODEL dropped back under urging on the outside, went three then two wide early on the turn, moved back to the three then four path later on that bend, spun five wide into the stretch and just got up for the show. KING ANGELO was restless in the gate, moved out while urged along off the pace, went four wide on the turn and lacked the needed response then just missed the show. EASTERN BAY was urged along on the outside, dropped from the five path to the three path early on the turn, came four wide into the stretch and failed to respond. ANDIAMO A FIRENZE broke through the front of the gate prior to the start then was brought back around and reloaded, set the pace under some pressure, vied in the two path on the turn, lost the lead in upper stretch and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Business Model
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back outside,2-4path turn,5w into lane,along for show

ENTRY.NAME: Bold Journey
ENTRY.OWNER: Pantofel Stable LLC Wachtel Stable and Barber Gary
ENTRY.COMMENT: came out brk,settled,gain 2p turn,angled out3/16,bid,drift out,up

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Fred W. Hertrich lll & John D. Fielding

ENTRY.NAME: King Angelo
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate,urged along,mvd out,4wide turn,missed show

ENTRY.NAME: Eastern Bay
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along outside,5-3path turn,4w1/4,failed to respond

ENTRY.NAME: He'smyhoneybadger
ENTRY.OWNER: Dubb Michael and America's Pastime Stables

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 4 1M Turf CR: 79. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NOTINAMILLIONYEARS (IRE) bumped with a rival at the start, went around the first turn in the two path, was unhurried at the rear, traveled four then five wide on the far turn, rallied outside in upper stretch, drifted in while closing fast coming to the sixteenth-pole and blew by the embattled leading duo to win going away. LE BEAU angled in early, saved ground on the first turn, moved out with five furlongs to run, was forwardly placed on the outside, chased three wide on the far turn, made a bid at the quarter-pole, dueled with RIVIERE into the final sixteenth and bested that foe for the place but was overtaken by the winner. RIVIERE moved in while going to the front, showed the way on the inside, was asked near the quarter-pole, dueled inside of LE BEAU into the final sixteenth and was also overtaken then just missed the place. I'M A SURE THING settled on the inside, was asked on the far turn, chased into the final furlong, moved out near the sixteenth-pole and finished willingly. REMIND (IRE) was keen under restraint into the first turn, saved ground while reserved towards the back, was asked turning into upper stretch, altered out from behind a foe inside the three-sixteenths then raced in light traffic and lacked the needed kick. MADAKET'S ARROW rounded the first turn in the three path, was reserved off the pace, bumped with a rival near the five-eighths, was roused four wide on the far turn and lacked the needed response. TACITURN was hustled from the gate then taken in hand early, saved ground on the first turn, was reserved in the back half of the field, traveled around the far turn in the two path and failed to rally. SHE WILL DANCE (IRE) went around the opening turn in the two path, bumped with a rival while forced out near the five-eighths pole then dropped back, saved ground on the far turn and failed to threaten. PUT THE CRAZY AWAY broke out at the start, raced in the three path on the first turn, prompted the pace on the outside, vied in the two path on the far turn, dropped back in upper stretch and came up empty. YOU ONLY LIVE ONCE bumped with a foe at the start, went three wide on the turns and faltered then was reported to have bled.

ENTRY.NAME: Put the Crazy Away
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out,3p1st,prompt outside,2p2nd turn,came up empty

ENTRY.NAME: Remind (IRE)

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of LEO

ENTRY.OWNER: Magnier Mrs John Lindy Farms and Ice Wine Stable

ENTRY.NAME: You Only Live Once
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,3wide turns,no response,reported to have bled

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 93. Claiming Purse 36000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare A ssessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOLD VICTORY settled on the outside, dropped back under urging outside the five-eighths pole, fell further behind the leaders late on the backstretch, was urged four wide on the turn then driven five wide into the stretch, gained in the final furlong and got up in the final sixteenth to prevail. HAMMERIN AAMER tracked the pace, engaged the leaders in the three path on the turn, took the advantage coming to the quarter-pole, was asked for his best in upper stretch, shook off DONTBELATE nearing the sixteenth-pole but was caught by the winner while able to get the place. DONTBELATE disputed the pace, vied in the two path on the turn, battled under a drive until near the sixteenth-pole then weakened while clear for the show. PIT BOSS bumped with a rival at the start, disputed the pace, vied along the rail under urging on the turn, dropped back outside the five-sixteenths and tired. JOKER BOY was urged along while disputing the early pace, dropped back with five furlongs to run, went around the turn in the two path and lacked the needed response. DIXIE DRAWL broke in and brushed with a rival, was urged along off the pace, dropped back late on the backstretch, went three wide on the turn and was no factor. SALTO DE TIGRE broke out and brushed with a rival, was well placed early, dropped back late on the backstretch, saved ground on the turn and came up empty. GRUMPS LITTLE TOTS bumped with a rival at the start, raced at the rear, saved ground on the turn, came out into the stretch and never reached contention. JUMPSTER dropped well off the pace, went two then three wide on the turn, angled out in upper stretch and showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Jumpster
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, 2-3path turn, angled out 3/16, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Hammerin Aamer
ENTRY.OWNER: Beast Mode Racing LLC and America's Pastime Stables

ENTRY.NAME: Bold Victory
ENTRY.OWNER: Goldfarb Sanford J Carney Christopher L Speranza Steven and Kahn Alan

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 6 6F Outer turf CR: 90. Allowance Purse 100000. OUTER TURF (UP TO $17,400 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. No n-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter Allowed 2 lbs. (Rail at 12 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PLAY THE MUSIC pressed the pace on the outside then in the two path on the turn, took the lead into upper stretch, shook clear into the final furlong and held under strong urging. LOON CRY settled at the rear, saved ground on the turn, was roused in the two path into the stretch, found her best stride in the final furlong and finished fast but was too late while up for the place. KERRY was well placed just off the pace on the inside, came out four wide into upper stretch, chased the winner into the final furlong and lacked the needed kick while able to get the show. GEORGEES SPIRIT settled off the pace, saved ground on the turn, was roused outside the quarter-pole, came under the crop in upper stretch and improved position. LOST MY SOCK angled in while settling off the pace, traveled around the turn in the two path, came five wide into upper stretch and lacked the needed kick. FONTANAFREDDA bumped with a foe at the start, went three wide on the turn, came six wide into the stretch and failed to threaten. SWEET DUTCHESS settled towards the rear, went two to three wide on the turn, was asked at the quarter-pole and lacked the needed response. DEKANTER was hustled from the gate, raced just off the pace, went around the turn in the two path, came out five wide into upper stretch and capitulated. FREE TO ROAM bumped with an opponent at the start, was urged off the pace, went four wide on the turn, came five wide into the stretch and failed to rally. PRIVATE CREDIT settled under some urging, went three wide while between rivals on the turn and failed to respond. FLEETFOOTED went to the front, set the pace under pressure to her outside, vied along the rail on the turn, lost the lead into upper stretch and gave way. CAIRONI was urged along off the pace, dropped back four wide on the turn, spun five wide into the stretch and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Kerry
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed,inside turn,came out 1/4,chased,lacked needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: Dekanter
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Road Racing and Old Tavern Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,just off pace,2path turn,5w into upper,empty

ENTRY.OWNER: Abreu Jorge R Photos Finish LLC and Sportsmen Stable

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Dutchess
ENTRY.OWNER: Pantofel Stable LLC Wachtel Stable and Barber Gary
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled towards rear,2-3path turn,asked1/4,failed to rally

ENTRY.NAME: Fleetfooted
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace,headed into upper stretch,gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Private Credit
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled some urging,3wide btwn foes turn,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Fontanafredda
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,well back,3w turn,6w into lane,no threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 7 1 1/16M Turf CR: 87. Claiming Purse 41000. (UP TO $7,134 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (1.5% Aftercare Asses sment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TAP IT UP was well placed while rated just off the pace on the inside, moved out behind the leaders while asked in upper stretch, rallied to make a bid coming to the furlong marker and drew clear under steady urging. LADY JASMINE stalked the pace on the outside in the two path, was asked on the far turn, took the lead into upper stretch, led under a drive into the final furlong then was headed by the winner and proved no match while able to hold the place. SISTER NELL saved ground on the first turn, settled at the rear, went three wide on the far turn, came five wide into the stretch and improved to just get the show. FROM HELLO was reserved on the inside, came under encouragement on the final turn, moved out in upper stretch and lacked the needed kick then just missed the show. NIGHTSABER (GB) went two to three wide on both turns, was asked on the final bend, chased the leader into the final furlong and weakened. ANILEATE was reserved in the two to three path, steadied between horses at the three-sixteenths, steadied again near the sixteenth-pole then altered out and lost her best chance. RHEAUME went three wide on the first turn, was reserved off the pace, saved ground on the far turn, brushed with a rival in upper stretch and lacked the needed response. SARATOGA CHROME was restless in the gate then taken under a tight hold early, saved ground while reserved towards the rear, dropped back with three furlongs to run, came off the rail into the stretch and was no factor. EXCEPT TEMPTATION went around the first turn in the tow path, settled in the middle of the field, was roused in the two then three path on the far turn and failed to threaten. PIMENOVA went three to four wide on the turns and failed to respond. JUDGEMENT TIME was taken under a tight hold early, went four wide on the turns, came six wide into the stretch and also failed to respond. MOULY went to the front, showed the way on the inside, was asked near the quarter-pole, lost the lead in upper stretch and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Sister Nell
ENTRY.COMMENT: ins1st,settled,3w2nd turn,5w into lane,improved for show

ENTRY.NAME: Saratoga Chrome
ENTRY.OWNER: Campbell David E and Powers Sandra
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate,tight hold,inside,drop back3/8,came out1/4,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Jasmine
ENTRY.OWNER: Donk David G Behrendt John T Marquis Charles K Haslup Suzanne K Carney Sean Punk

ENTRY.NAME: Nightsaber (GB)
ENTRY.OWNER: Dorrian Michael Dorrian Chris Dorrian James and Hausman James

ENTRY.NAME: Pimenova
ENTRY.OWNER: Flying P Stable and Rosedown Racing Stables LLC

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 100. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 105000. (UP TO $18,270 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 THREE TIMES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON $60,000 IN 2023 OR OPT IONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $80,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $80,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercar e Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CAPTAINSDAUGHTER chased the leading trio on the outside then four wide on the turn, gained to take the advantage in upper stretch, remained on her inside lead until near the eighth-pole then swapped to the proper lead, drifted out under a right-handed crop late and held under steady urging. ROSEBUG was urged along off the pace, went two then three wide early on the turn, angled five wide nearing the five-sixteenths, gained outside into upper stretch, made a bid in the final furlong and finished willingly for the place. RACHEL'S ROCK disputed the pace on the inside of two foes, vied along the rail on the turn, dropped back in upper stretch and was outfinished but kept on with good courage to get the show. SELF ISOLATION contested the pace between horses, vied in the two path while still between foes on the turn, dropped back in upper stretch and weakened. MOSIENKO stumbled at the start and was off slow, spotted the front a few lengths, was coaxed at the rear, moved from the rail to the two path on the turn, shifted four wide at the quarter-pole, chased into the final furlong and lacked the needed response. HEY MAMALUKE contested the pace on the outside of two rivals, vied in the three path on the turn and capitulated then was vanned off after the race.

ENTRY.NAME: Rachel's Rock
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace inside duo,rail turn,outfinished,kept on,good courage for3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Mosienko
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled brk,off slow,coaxed at rear,ins-2p turn,4p1/4,no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Self Isolation
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace between foes,2path turn,drop back upper stretch,weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Hey Mamaluke
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace outside duo,3path turn,capitulated,vanned off after race

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 9 6F Outer turf CR: 78. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. OUTER TURF FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred) . (Rail at 12 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OKALOOSA was forwardly placed on the outside, went three wide on the turn, rallied to the lead in upper stretch and just held under strong urging. SCHERZANDO bumped with a rival at the start, was urged along off the pace, angled from the two path to the four path near the five-sixteenths, came five wide into the stretch, rallied outside to make a bid in the final furlong but just missed while clear for the place. BUSTINO SANTINO was urged along off the pace, went around the turn in the two path, was driven four wide into the stretch, chased the winner in the drive and was outfinished while able to get the show. TWIRLING VINE settled off the pace, saved ground on the turn, moved out in upper stretch and improved position. EGYPTIAN QUEST broke out at the start, was urged along off the pace, went three wide on the turn and lacked the needed kick. KY THIRTY WON broke out at the start, was urged along on the outside, went three wide on the turn, spun four wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response. KERN RIVER was well placed just off the pace, saved ground on the turn, waited behind the leaders into upper stretch, dropped back into the final furlong and came up empty. SCARAMANGA was away alertly, showed in front early then pressed the pace on the outside, vied in the two path on the turn, dropped back in upper stretch and tired. LOOKIN' TO WIN brushed the inside of the gate at the start then bumped with a foe, saved ground on the turn and was no factor. WHISKEY AND WINE bumped with a foe at the start, moved up to set the pace under pressure to his outside, vied along the rail on the turn, lost the advantage in upper stretch and gave way. KID EMERALD broke inward and was off very slow, spotted the front many lengths, saved ground on the turn, struck the hind-end of the loose rival in upper stretch, swerved out then unseated the rider and was walked off after being apprehended. PROUD ALUMNUS settled towards the rear, rounded the turn in the two path, came four wide into the stretch, ducked in very sharply near the three-sixteenths and unseated the rider then was walked off after being apprehended.

ENTRY.NAME: Kid Emerald
ENTRY.COMMENT: off very slow,ins turn,hit loose foe 3/16,unseated rider

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey and Wine
ENTRY.OWNER: Woodford Racing LLC Lane's End Racing Phipps Stable Langone Ken and Hudson Jr Ed
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start,moved up,set pressured pace,ins turn,gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Kern River
ENTRY.OWNER: Goldfarb Sanford J and Carney Christopher L

ENTRY.NAME: Okaloosa
ENTRY.OWNER: Eclipse Thoroughbred Partners and Glebe Ventures

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Eclipse Thoroughbred Partners & Glebe Ventures LLC

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Egyptian Quest
ENTRY.OWNER: Demasi Kathleen A and Sardello David
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,urged along,3wide turn,lacked needed kick

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Ky Thirty Won
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,urged outside,3wide turn,4w1/4,lacked needed kick
